title: Whitehorse Layers Complex Rhythms In 'Leave No Bridge'
teaser: Luke Doucet and Melissa McClelland, the musical — and married — couple that is the Canadian band Whitehorse, talk with NPR's Scott Simon about their latest album, Leave No Bridge Unburned.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
